name: Project Guard
description:
Project Guard is an action-shooter game developed by Nintendo.
Project Guard is available on Wii U.
It was produced by Atsushi Inaba and Tadashi Sugiyama. It was directed by Teruaki Konishi and Yugo Hayashi. Kensuke Inage, Naofumi Harada and Ryuta Yoshioka scored the game.
